Others: Scotland beat Namibia by 5 wickets in their T20 World Cup 2024 Group B match
Brad Wheal scalped three wickets for Namibia
Richie Berrington and Michael Leask scored 47* and 35 runs respectively for Scotland
Others (Detailed): Zane Green scored 52 runs for Namibia
George Munsey and Michael Jones made their way out to the middle for Scotland
Ruben Trumpelmann took two wickets for Namibia
